{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:17:42.279

    | name      = Unknown Speaker

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:17:50.039
    | text      = In Crimson Contagion, the idea was to test interagency collaboration as well as collaboration
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

    | name      = Unknown Speaker

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:18:35.440
    | text      = Conversely, SPARS is a little bit of a different kind of scenario exercise.

{{TranscriptBlock

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:18:48.859
    | text      = about how you could best respond to those developments.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:18:53.000
    | text      = SPARS is an exercise that is explicitly about messaging and public health risk communication,
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:18:58.200

    | name      = Unknown Speaker

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
